CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(VS_Region__c, 'VSI'),ISPICKVAL(VS_Region__c, 'VSE')), Total_Total_Revenue__c,null) /* CASE(distributor__r.Name, 'ALSO Deutschland GmbH', repQtyXValue_Total_Revenue__c, 'Ingram Micro Distribution GmbH', Gesamt_Preis_Total_Revenue__c, 'Computation Systemhaus GmbH', Total_Total_Revenue__c, 'Delo Computer GmbH', Umsatz_Total_Revenue__c, 'Herweck AG', Gesamtpreis_Total_Revenue__c, 'Schuss AV-Projektionssysteme GmbH', Selling_Sum_Total_Revenue__c, 'Tarox AG', HEK_SUMME_Formula__c, 'prodyTel Distribution GmbH', Total_Revenue_Total_Revenue__c, null) */
CustomField.label: Total Revenue
